definition: To set up or configure a software or hardware system on a device, typically a computer or electronic device, to make it ready for use. This action involves the process of installing and configuring the necessary components or programs to ensure proper functionality. It is commonly used in the context of technology and computer systems.

examples.english: I have to install the program.

examples.german: Kannst du mir helfen, den Drucker zu installieren?
examples.english: Can you help me install the printer?

examples.german: Die neue Version der App l채sst sich nicht installieren.
examples.english: The new version of the app cannot be installed.

examples.german: Bitte installieren Sie die Treiber f체r das Ger채t.
examples.english: Please install the drivers for the device.

examples.german: Die Software l채sst sich einfach installieren und verwenden.
examples.english: The software is easy to install and use.
